name: The Little Guy
description:
Welcome to my videogame demo. This game was developed so that I could showcase some of my skills, including drawing animation and coding.  The game is still in development and in the future I might add more abilities, environments and new features. 

Controls:

- Movement: wasd

- Jump: SPACE

- Attack: Left click

- Block: Right click (hold)

- Glide: Jump with space and then press and hold space again

If the game doesn't load in the browser you can still download it on windows using the button below.
